display_long_description:
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/QTWG3hmeHa
# **SwordTrip**: A Chinese-style Action Roguelite VR Game  

Unlock powerful abilities through stage rewards, and utilize a skill system specifically designed for VR interaction to build your preferred skill combinations. Experience overwhelming power to defeat your enemies!  

**MR Mode Gameplay**: Become a hero in mixed reality, blending the real and virtual worlds!  
[media]

**A More Exciting Combat System**: Enjoy the thrill of sword clashes and slashes without the frustration of weapons getting stuck.  
[media]

**Skill System**: A VR-interaction-based skill system designed to amaze you with every ability!  
[media]

**Culturally Immersive Lobby**: Interact with Chinese culture in the game lobby, where you can write or paint with a calligraphy brush and customize the images on the lobby's display board.  




[media]
